author: hadrian
msg: Added fastinstall profile for faster builds (does not run tests nor builds camel-manual)

author: jonesde
msg: Added a new condition to get the difference between the list price and the base price for the order/cart item as either an amount or a percent; this condition is different from existing conditions because it operates on cart items and not the entire cart as all of the other ones do, or in other words these conditions are used to qualify cart items for other conditions and actions on the same rule

author: schen
msg: MAPREDUCE-2169. Integrated Reed-Solomon code with RaidNode. (Ramkumar Vadali via schen)
